historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 22-3108.

1973 Ed., § 22-3108.

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary amendment of section, see § 105(p) of the Omnibus Criminal Justice Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 1994 (D.C. Act 10-255, June 22, 1994, 41 DCR 4286).

For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 7(b) of the Sentencing Reform Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 13-462, October 25, 2000, 47 DCR 9443).

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-151, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 22-3306.

For Law 14-309, see notes following § 22-3310.

DC CODE § 22-3308

Current through December 11, 2012

division.text: Criminal Law and Procedure and Prisoners.

heading.catch_text: Cutting down or destroying things growing on or attached to the land of another. [Repealed]
